#include <stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,turn=1;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n!=0){
		int i,st[n],each=0,ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%d",&st[i]);
			each+=st[i];
		}
		each=each/n;
		sort(st,st+n);
		for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
			if( (st[i]-each)<=0)
			break;
			else{
				ans+=(st[i]-each);
			}
		}
		printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n",turn,ans);
		scanf("%d",&n);
		turn++;
	}
	return 0;
}
